text: Evarkalai allah nerana valiyil celuttukirano avarkal tan nerana valiyai ataivarkal. Evarkalai (allah) tavarana valiyil vittuvitukirano avarkalukku utavi ceypavarkalai avanait tavirttu veruyaraiyum nir kana mattir. Melum, marumainalil avarkalaik kurutarkalakavum, umaiyarkalakavum, cevitarkalakavum (akki) avarkal tankal mukattal natantu varumpati (ceytu) avarkalai onru cerppom. Avarkalutaiya tankumitam narakamtan. (Atan) anal taniyum potellam menmelum koluntu vitteriyumpati ceytu konte iruppom
